Map multiple (or thousands) of locations on a map for free

How do you place hundreds if not thousands of locations (zip codes, cities, states, zip codes, countries, latitude and longitude coordinates, etc) on map quickly? EasyMapMaker.com was designed for this purpose. If you can copy and paste hundreds or thousands of items, you can map them.

Check out the sample video for how to map hundreds or thousands of items.

How to make a map with over 500 locations Make a map with easymapmaker.com with over 500 locations from your excel or other spreadsheet data. Go to http://www.easymapmaker.com to make your own map.

Google Maps allows for mapping up to 100,000 items on maps. Our service does not put a cap on the amount of data that can be mapped, so you can map up to the maximum amount of data allowed.

Why pay for services that limit the amount of data that can be used when you can map more than data that older versions of Excel would even support?

In order for large amounts of data to be mapped, all the individual markers cannot be visible. Cluster or the grouping of nearby markers is supported and automatically set when there are more than 150 items. The maps can generally display 2500 markers without performance issues depending on the browser. Combining markers that can be as dense as 100 into a cluster easily allows for large data to be mapped. Zooming in on the map allows the individual markers to be visible.

There are 2 ways to map larges amounts of data

1. Data with Latitude and Longitude coordinates
  1. Make sure your data has the necessary latitude and longitude coordinates
  2. Make a map on our regular or advanced map making page
  3. Save the Map
2. Data with addresses (no latitude and longitude coordinates)

The second option is when your data does not have latitude and longitude data.

  1. Make a map on our regular or advanced map making page
  2. Save the Map after 250 coordinates have been mapped
  3. Click on the link that is automatically generated to bulk-geo the remaining data (yellow highlighted portion in image)
  4. Geocoded locations are automatically saved after every 250 locations have been processed.
  5. Once all the locations have been processed, the edit map page will be loaded to make any final adjustments.
